short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome developer tools extension for viewing SAML messages in chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a tab to the Chrome DevTools. The new SAML tab lists all requests and marks the SAML requests with green. When clicking the event the SAML XML is shown.
